Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, capturing reagent: ACN/H2O/TFA (90/8/2 v/v/v)
Other Information.Additional Info: Enrichment of N-glycopeptides from IgG digests

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, molar ratio of IgG digests to BSA protein at 1/500/500
Other Information.Additional Info: Exclusion of macromolecular proteins during enrichment

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: 281 N-glycopeptides identified from 2 μL serum digests of NPC patients; 181 N-glycopeptides identified from healthy volunteers

Other Information.Additional Info: The material demonstrated excellent selectivity, high sensitivity (1 fmol μL−1 for IgG digests), and good size-exclusion ability.
